body_html:
You can just sess.run(a) after finishing sess.run(i).

Another bug in your code above is that the second get_variable should be under the variable scope "a", otherwise you're creating a new variable.
body_text:
You can just sess.run(a) after finishing sess.run(i).
Another bug in your code above is that the second get_variable should be under the variable scope "a", otherwise you're creating a new variable.
body:
You can just `sess.run(a)` after finishing `sess.run(i)`.

Another bug in your code above is that the second `get_variable` should be under the variable scope "a", otherwise you're creating a new variable.
